official_title: Pilot Test of an mHealth Intervention for Reducing Alcohol Use Among Adolescent and Young Adult Cancer Survivors
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosed with cancer between age 15-39
* Currently age 18-39
* 3 months-15 years post-treatment
* Meets criteria for risky alcohol use
* Reside in United States
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 39 Years
